author: cbs8
title: Global Automotive Turbocharger Market 2015-2019 - Benefits of Fuel Efficiency is a Key Market Driver
text:
Research and Markets
DUBLIN , Oct. 21, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Research and Markets ( http://www.researchandmarkets.com/research/ztmqbs/global_automotive ) has announced the addition of the "Global Automotive Turbocharger Market 2015-2019" report to their offering.
This report covers the present scenario and growth prospects of the global automotive turbocharger market for the period 2015-2019. The market size has been calculated based on the number of turbocharger units produced globally in the automotive turbocharger market. The report presents five key vendors and a detailed analysis of these vendors. Based on the type of engine, we have segmented the automotive turbocharger market into turbochargers in gasoline engines and turbochargers in diesel engines.
In addition, the market is also segmented based on end-users and type of vehicle (light vehicles and heavy vehicles). The report also highlights the automotive turbocharger market landscape in the 3 main geographies of APAC, EMEA, and the Americas. We also discuss market growth drivers, the challenges faced by vendors and the industry as a whole, as well as key trends emerging in the market.
The report, Global Automotive Turbocharger Market 2015-2019, has been prepared based on an in-depth market analysis with inputs from industry experts. The report covers the global automotive turbocharger market landscape and its growth prospects during the forecast period. The report also includes a discussion on the key vendors operating in this market.
Key vendors
Borg Warner Cummins Honeywell International IHI Mitsubishi Heavy Industries Key Topics Covered:
